00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup USART_Exported_Types USART exported types
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 /* Definition of USART Init Structure  ---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 typedef struct
00054 {
00055   u32 USART_BaudRate;
00056   u16 USART_WordLength;
00057   u16 USART_StopBits;
00058   u16 USART_Parity;
00059   u32 USART_Mode;
00060 } USART_InitTypeDef;
00061 
00062 typedef struct
00063 {
00064   u16 USART_ClockEnable;
00065   u16 USART_ClockPhase;
00066   u16 USART_ClockPolarity;
00067   u16 USART_TransferSelectMode;
00068 } USART_SynClock_InitTypeDef;
00069 /**
00070   * @}
00071   */
00072 
00073 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00074 /** @defgroup USART_Exported_Constants USART exported constants
00075   * @{
00076   */
00077 
00078 #define USART_CMD_TX                  (0)
00079 #define USART_CMD_RX                  (1)
00080 
00081 #define USART_CMD_OUT                 (0)
00082 #define USART_CMD_IN                  (1)
00083 
00084 /* USART Word Length ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085 /** @defgroup USART_Word_Length Definitions of USART word length
00086   * @{
00087   */
00088 #define USART_WORDLENGTH_7B           ((u32)0x00000000)
00089 #define USART_WORDLENGTH_8B           ((u32)0x00000100)
00090 #define USART_WORDLENGTH_9B           ((u32)0x00000200)
00091 
00092 #define IS_USART_WORD_LENGTH(LENGTH)  ((LENGTH == USART_WORDLENGTH_9B) || \
00093                                        (LENGTH == USART_WORDLENGTH_8B) || \
00094                                        (LENGTH == USART_WORDLENGTH_7B))
00095 /**
00096   * @}
00097   */
00098 
00099 /* USART Stop Bits -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00100 /** @defgroup USART_Stop_Bit Definitions of USART stop bit
00101   * @{
00102   */
00103 #define USART_STOPBITS_1              ((u32)0x00000000)
00104 #define USART_STOPBITS_2              ((u32)0x00000400)
00105 
00106 
00107 #define IS_USART_STOPBITS(STOPBITS)   ((STOPBITS == USART_STOPBITS_1) || \
00108                                        (STOPBITS == USART_STOPBITS_2))
00109 /**
00110   * @}
00111   */
00112 
00113 /* USART Parity --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00114 /** @defgroup USART_Parity Definitions of USART parity
00115   * @{
00116   */
00117 #define USART_PARITY_NO               ((u32)0x00000000)
00118 #define USART_PARITY_EVEN             ((u32)0x00001800)
00119 #define USART_PARITY_ODD              ((u32)0x00000800)
00120 #define USART_PARITY_MARK             ((u32)0x00002800)
00121 #define USART_PARITY_SPACE            ((u32)0x00003800)
00122 
00123 #define IS_USART_PARITY(PARITY)       ((PARITY == USART_PARITY_NO)   || \
00124                                        (PARITY == USART_PARITY_EVEN) || \
00125                                        (PARITY == USART_PARITY_ODD))
00126 /**
00127   * @}
00128   */
00129 
00130 /* USART Mode ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00131 /** @defgroup USART_Mode Definitions of USART mode
00132   * @{
00133   */
00134 #define USART_MODE_NORMAL             ((u32)0x00000000)
00135 #define USART_MODE_IRDA               ((u32)0x00000001)
00136 #define USART_MODE_RS485              ((u32)0x00000002)
00137 #define USART_MODE_SYNCHRONOUS        ((u32)0x00000003)
00138 #if (LIBCFG_USART_LIN)
00139 #define USART_MODE_LIN                ((u32)0x00010000)
00140 #define IS_MODE_LIN(x)                (x == USART_MODE_LIN)
00141 #else
00142 #define IS_MODE_LIN(x)                (0)
00143 #endif
00144 #if (LIBCFG_USART_SINGLE_WIRE)
00145 #define USART_MODE_SINGLE_WIRE        ((u32)0x00010001)
00146 #define IS_MODE_SINGLE_WIRE(x)        (x == USART_MODE_SINGLE_WIRE)
00147 #else
00148 #define IS_MODE_SINGLE_WIRE(x)        (0)
00149 #endif
00150 #define IS_USART_MODE(MODE)           ((MODE == USART_MODE_NORMAL)      || \
00151                                        (MODE == USART_MODE_IRDA)        || \
00152                                        (MODE == USART_MODE_RS485)       || \
00153                                        (MODE == USART_MODE_SYNCHRONOUS) || \
00154                                        IS_MODE_LIN(MODE)                || \
00155                                        IS_MODE_SINGLE_WIRE(MODE))
00156 /**
00157   * @}
00158   */
00159 
00160 /* USART Transfer Select Mode ------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00161 /** @defgroup USART_LSB Definitions of USART LSB
00162   * @{
00163   */
00164 #define USART_LSB_FIRST               ((u32)0x00000000)
00165 #define USART_MSB_FIRST               ((u32)0x00000004)
00166 
00167 #define IS_USART_TRANSFER_MODE(TMODE) ((TMODE == USART_LSB_FIRST) || \
00168                                        (TMODE == USART_MSB_FIRST))
00169 /**
00170   * @}
00171   */

00174 /* USART Synchronous Clock ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00175 /** @defgroup USART_Synchronous_Clock Definitions of USART synchronous clock
00176   * @{
00177   */
00178 #define USART_SYN_CLOCK_DISABLE                 ((u32)0x00000000)
00179 #define USART_SYN_CLOCK_ENABLE                  ((u32)0x00000001)
00180 
00181 #define IS_USART_SYNCHRONOUS_CLOCK(SYNCLOCK)    ((SYNCLOCK == USART_SYN_CLOCK_DISABLE) || \
00182                                                  (SYNCLOCK == USART_SYN_CLOCK_ENABLE))
00183 /**
00184   * @}
00185   */

00188 /** @defgroup USART_Synchronous_Clock_Phase Definitions of USART Synchronous clock phase

00190   */
00191 #define USART_SYN_CLOCK_PHASE_FIRST             ((u32)0x00000000)
00192 #define USART_SYN_CLOCK_PHASE_SECOND            ((u32)0x00000004)
00193 
00194 #define IS_USART_SYNCHRONOUS_PHASE(PHASE)       ((PHASE == USART_SYN_CLOCK_PHASE_FIRST) || \
00195                                                  (PHASE == USART_SYN_CLOCK_PHASE_SECOND))
00196 /**
00197   * @}
00198   */
00199 
00200 /* USART Clock Polarity ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00201 /** @defgroup USART_Clock_Polarity Definitions of USART clock polarity
00202   * @{
00203   */
00204 #define USART_SYN_CLOCK_POLARITY_LOW            ((u32)0x00000000)
00205 #define USART_SYN_CLOCK_POLARITY_HIGH           ((u32)0x00000008)
00206 
00207 #define IS_USART_SYNCHRONOUS_POLARITY(POLARITY) ((POLARITY == USART_SYN_CLOCK_POLARITY_LOW) || \
00208                                                  (POLARITY == USART_SYN_CLOCK_POLARITY_HIGH))
00209 /**
00210   * @}
00211   */

00213 /* USART IrDA  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00214 /** @defgroup USART_IrDA Definitions of USART IrDA
00215   * @{
00216   */
00217 #define USART_IRDA_LOWPOWER                     ((u32)0x00000002)
00218 #define USART_IRDA_NORMAL                       ((u32)0xFFFFFFFD)
00219 
00220 #define IS_USART_IRDA_MODE(MODE)                ((MODE == USART_IRDA_LOWPOWER) || \
00221                                                  (MODE == USART_IRDA_NORMAL))
00222 
00223 #define USART_IRDA_TX                           ((u32)0x00000004)
00224 #define USART_IRDA_RX                           ((u32)0xFFFFFFFB)
00225 
00226 #define IS_USART_IRDA_DIRECTION(DIRECTION)      ((DIRECTION == USART_IRDA_TX) || \
00227                                                  (DIRECTION == USART_IRDA_RX))
00228 /**
00229   * @}
00230   */
00231 
00232 #define IS_USART_TL(x)                (IS_USART_RXTL(x) || IS_USART_TXTL(x))
00233 
00234 /* USART Rx FIFO Interrupt Trigger Level -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00235 /** @defgroup USART_RX_FIFO_Trigger_Level Definitions of USART Rx FIFO interrupts
00236   * @{
00237   */
00238 #define USART_RXTL_01                 ((u32)0x00000000)
00239 #define USART_RXTL_02                 ((u32)0x00000010)
00240 #define USART_RXTL_04                 ((u32)0x00000020)
00241 #define USART_RXTL_06                 ((u32)0x00000030)
00242 
00243 #define IS_USART_RXTL(RXTL)           ((RXTL == USART_RXTL_01) || \
00244                                        (RXTL == USART_RXTL_02) || \
00245                                        (RXTL == USART_RXTL_04) || \
00246                                        (RXTL == USART_RXTL_06))
00247 /**
00248   * @}
00249   */
00250 
00251 /* USART Tx FIFO Interrupt Trigger Level -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00252 /** @defgroup USART_TX_FIFO_Trigger_Level Definitions of USART Tx FIFO interrupts
00253   * @{
00254   */
00255 #define USART_TXTL_00                 ((u32)0x00000000)
00256 #define USART_TXTL_02                 ((u32)0x00000010)
00257 #define USART_TXTL_04                 ((u32)0x00000020)
00258 #define USART_TXTL_06                 ((u32)0x00000030)
00259 
00260 #define IS_USART_TXTL(TXTL)           ((TXTL == USART_TXTL_00) || \
00261                                        (TXTL == USART_TXTL_02) || \
00262                                        (TXTL == USART_TXTL_04) || \
00263                                        (TXTL == USART_TXTL_06))
00264 /**
00265   * @}
00266   */
00267 
00268 /* USART Interrupt definition ------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00269 /** @defgroup USART_Interrupt_Enable Definitions of USART interrupt Enable bits
00270   * @{
00271   */
00272 #define USART_INT_RXDR                ((u32)0x00000001)
00273 #define USART_INT_TXDE                ((u32)0x00000002)
00274 #define USART_INT_TXC                 ((u32)0x00000004)
00275 #define USART_INT_OE                  ((u32)0x00000008)
00276 #define USART_INT_PE                  ((u32)0x00000010)
00277 #define USART_INT_FE                  ((u32)0x00000020)
00278 #define USART_INT_BI                  ((u32)0x00000040)
00279 #define USART_INT_RSADD               ((u32)0x00000080)
00280 #define USART_INT_TOUT                ((u32)0x00000100)
00281 #define USART_INT_CTS                 ((u32)0x00000200)
00282 #if (LIBCFG_USART_LIN)
00283 #define USART_INT_LBD                 ((u32)0x00000400)
00284 #endif
00285 
00286 #if (LIBCFG_USART_LIN)
00287 #define IS_USART_INT(INT)             ((((INT) & 0xFFFFF800) == 0) && ((INT) != 0))
00288 #else
00289 #define IS_USART_INT(INT)             ((((INT) & 0xFFFFFC00) == 0) && ((INT) != 0))
00290 #endif
00291 /**
00292   * @}
00293   */
00294 
00295 /* USART Flags ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00296 /** @defgroup USART_Flag Definitions of USART flags
00297   * @{
00298   */
00299 #define USART_FLAG_RXDNE              ((u32)0x00000001)
00300 #define USART_FLAG_OE                 ((u32)0x00000002)
00301 #define USART_FLAG_PE                 ((u32)0x00000004)
00302 #define USART_FLAG_FE                 ((u32)0x00000008)
00303 #define USART_FLAG_BI                 ((u32)0x00000010)
00304 #define USART_FLAG_RXDR               ((u32)0x00000020)
00305 #define USART_FLAG_TOUT               ((u32)0x00000040)
00306 #define USART_FLAG_TXDE               ((u32)0x00000080)
00307 #define USART_FLAG_TXC                ((u32)0x00000100)
00308 #define USART_FLAG_RSADD              ((u32)0x00000200)
00309 #define USART_FLAG_CTSC               ((u32)0x00000400)
00310 #define USART_FLAG_CTSS               ((u32)0x00000800)
00311 #if (LIBCFG_USART_LIN)
00312 #define USART_FLAG_LBD                ((u32)0x00001000)
00313 #define IS_FLAG_LBD(x)                (x == USART_FLAG_LBD)
00314 #else
00315 #define IS_FLAG_LBD(x)                (0)
00316 #endif
00317 
00318 #define IS_USART_FLAG(FLAG)           ((FLAG == USART_FLAG_RXDNE) || (FLAG == USART_FLAG_OE)    || \
00319                                        (FLAG == USART_FLAG_PE)    || (FLAG == USART_FLAG_FE)    || \
00320                                        (FLAG == USART_FLAG_BI)    || (FLAG == USART_FLAG_RXDR)  || \
00321                                        (FLAG == USART_FLAG_TOUT)  || (FLAG == USART_FLAG_TXDE)  || \
00322                                        (FLAG == USART_FLAG_TXC)   || (FLAG == USART_FLAG_RSADD) || \
00323                                        (FLAG == USART_FLAG_CTSC)  || (FLAG == USART_FLAG_CTSS)  || \
00324                                        IS_FLAG_LBD(FLAG))
00325 
00326 #define IS_USART_CLEAR_FLAG(FLAG)     ((FLAG == USART_FLAG_OE)    || (FLAG == USART_FLAG_PE)    || \
00327                                        (FLAG == USART_FLAG_FE)    || (FLAG == USART_FLAG_BI)    || \
00328                                        (FLAG == USART_FLAG_TOUT)  || (FLAG == USART_FLAG_RSADD) || \
00329                                        (FLAG == USART_FLAG_CTSC)  || IS_FLAG_LBD(FLAG))
00330 /**
00331   * @}
00332   */
00333

00355 #define USART_LINLENGTH_11BIT                   ((u32)0x00040000)
00356

00358                                                  (LENGTH == USART_LINLENGTH_11BIT))
00359 #endif
00360 /**
00361   * @}
00362   */
00363 
00364 #define USART_FIFO_TX                           ((u32)0x00000001)
00365 #define USART_FIFO_RX                           ((u32)0x00000002)
00366 
00367 #define IS_USART_FIFO_DIRECTION(DIRECTION)      ((DIRECTION == USART_FIFO_TX) || \
00368                                                  (DIRECTION == USART_FIFO_RX))
00369 
00370 #define USART_STICK_LOW                         ((u32)0x00001000)
00371 #define USART_STICK_HIGH                        ((u32)0xFFFFEFFF)
00372 
00373 #define IS_USART_STICK_PARITY(PARITY)           ((PARITY == USART_STICK_LOW) || (PARITY == USART_STICK_HIGH))
00374 
00375 #if (LIBCFG_PDMA)
00376 #define USART_PDMAREQ_TX                        ((u32)0x00000040)
00377 #define USART_PDMAREQ_RX                        ((u32)0x00000080)
00378 
00379 #define IS_USART_PDMA_REQ(REQ)                  (((REQ & 0xFFFFFF3F) == 0x0) && (REQ != 0x0))
00380 #endif
00381 
00382 #define IS_USART(x)                             (IS_USART0(x) || \
00383                                                  IS_USART1(x) || \
00384                                                  IS_UART0(x)  || \
00385                                                  IS_UART1(x)  || \
00386                                                  IS_UART2(x)  || \
00387                                                  IS_UART3(x))
00388 #if (LIBCFG_NO_USART0)
00389 #define IS_USART0(x)    (0)
00390 #else
00391 #define IS_USART0(x)    (x == HT_USART0)
00392 #endif
00393 #define IS_UART0(x)     (x == HT_UART0)
00394 #if (LIBCFG_USART1)
00395 #define IS_USART1(x)    (x == HT_USART1)
00396 #else
00397 #define IS_USART1(x)    (0)
00398 #endif
00399 #if (LIBCFG_UART1)
00400 #define IS_UART1(x)     (x == HT_UART1)
00401 #else
00402 #define IS_UART1(x)     (0)
00403 #endif
00404 #if (LIBCFG_UART2)
00405 #define IS_UART2(x)     (x == HT_UART2)
00406 #else
00407 #define IS_UART2(x)     (0)
00408 #endif
00409 #if (LIBCFG_UART3)
00410 #define IS_UART3(x)     (x == HT_UART3)
00411 #else
00412 #define IS_UART3(x)     (0)
00413 #endif
00414 #define IS_USART_BAUDRATE(BAUDRATE)             ((BAUDRATE > 0) && (BAUDRATE < 0x0044AA21))
00415 #define IS_USART_DATA(DATA)                     (DATA <= 0x1FF)
00416 #define IS_USART_GUARD_TIME(TIME)               (TIME <= 0xFF)
00417 #define IS_USART_IRDA_PRESCALER(PRESCALER)      (PRESCALER <= 0xFF)
00418 #define IS_USART_TIMEOUT(TIMEOUT)               (TIMEOUT <= 0x7F)
00419 #define IS_USART_ADDRESS_MATCH_VALUE(VALUE)     (VALUE <= 0xFF)
00420 /**
00421   * @}
00422   */

00428 #define USART_TxCmd(USARTx, NewState)              USART_TxRxCmd(USARTx, USART_CMD_TX, NewState)
00429 #define USART_RxCmd(USARTx, NewState)              USART_TxRxCmd(USARTx, USART_CMD_RX, NewState)

00431 #define USART_TxPDMACmd(USARTx, NewState)          USART_PDMACmd(USARTx, USART_PDMAREQ_TX, NewState)
00432 #define USART_RxPDMACmd(USARTx, NewState)          USART_PDMACmd(USARTx, USART_PDMAREQ_RX, NewState)
00433 
00434 #define USART_RXTLConfig(USARTx, USART_tl)         USART_TXRXTLConfig(USARTx, USART_CMD_RX, USART_tl)
00435 #define USART_TXTLConfig(USARTx, USART_tl)         USART_TXRXTLConfig(USARTx, USART_CMD_TX, USART_tl)
00436 
00437 #define USART_IrDAInvtOutputCmd(USARTx, NewState)  USART_IrDAInvtCmd(USARTx, USART_CMD_OUT, NewState)
00438 #define USART_IrDAInvtInputCmd(USARTx, NewState)   USART_IrDAInvtCmd(USARTx, USART_CMD_IN, NewState)

00491 /**
00492   * @}
00493   */
00494 
00495 #ifdef __cplusplus
00496 }
00497 #endif
00498 
00499 #endif
